item.description:
Let's head over to the Rock Bottom Brewery in the Theater District to check out their Happy Hour Specials, which are available from 2:30 PM until 5:30 PM. Several items are available for $2.99, $3.99 and $4.99 such as onion rings, tostadas, spicy spinach dip, brewery nachos, black bean and chicken quesadilla, titan toothpicks, buffalo chicken wings or tenders, cheeseburgers and more.

I'll arrive at 4 PM and hang until 6 PM. You're welcome to get there when you can and hang as long as you're able.

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Boylston (green line) subway station is closest, less than (five (5) minute walk). N.E. Medical (orange line) subway station is less than a ten (10) minute walk.

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be seated at the bar
item.name: Let's Get to the Rock Bottom Brewery on Friday January 22nd
